# llms.txt for AI / LLM ingestion

User-agent: GPTBot
Allow: /

User-agent: PerplexityBot
Allow: /

User-agent: ClaudeBot
Allow: /

User-agent: *
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /api/internal/
Allow: /blog/
Allow: /docs/
Allow: /agents/
Allow: /use-cases/
Sitemap: https://aetheragentforge.org/sitemap.xml
